QuestData.Title: A Courteous Guest
QuestData.Description: I heard, I heard! The High Elder wants you to train with us!$b$bThere's going to be a banquet for us, the trainees... and you should probably bring a gift, as a sign of courtesy.$b$bThe oranges in the grove south of the temple are extra-sweet right now. Bring some back, for the banquet.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 8 Ripe Oranges from the orange groves south of Tian Monastery.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you ready for the banquet? I can't wait.
QuestData.RewardText: These will do perfectly. What a thoughtful gift, $n!$b$bMe? I'm bringing beer, of course.
